script.title: DV360 Bulk Targeting Editor
script.description: Allows bulk targeting DV360 through Sheets and BigQuery.
instructions: A Sheet called DV Targeter {field:recipe_name} will be created.
Select Load as the command, click Save, then Run.
In the 'Partners' sheet tab, fill in Filter column.
Select Load as the command, click Save, then Run.
In the 'Advertisers' sheet tab, fill in Filter column.
Select Load as the command, click Save, then Run.
In the 'Line Items' sheet tab, fill in Filter column.
Select Load as the command, click Save, then Run.
Make updates, fill in changes on all tabs with colored fields (RED FIELDS ARE NOT IMPLEMENTED, IGNORE).
Select Update as the command, click Save, then Run.
Load and Update can be run multiple times.
